resources.string:
We request access to your health data to provide personalized insights 
and support features that help you understand your activity, wellbeing, 
and overall health trends.

Health data accessed through Health Connect may include:
• Activity information (steps, distance, exercise sessions)
• Body measurements (weight, body fat, height)
• Sleep data (sleep duration and patterns)
• Nutrition and hydration information
• Heart-related and vital signs data, when relevant to supported features

We only access the types of data you explicitly grant permission for. 
Your data is used solely to enable in-app functionality such as progress 
visualization, trend analysis, and personalized recommendations.

Your health data remains on your device unless you choose to export or 
share it. We do not sell your data, and we do not share it with third 
parties without your clear and explicit consent.

For more detailed information about how we handle your data, please 
review our Privacy Policy.
